content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for coming to see my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price, but I would like to clarify a few things. May I know your budget for renting this apartment? Additionally, what length of lease are you looking for? This will help me determine a fair rental price for the property.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: 500 Euros per month is my budget. I'm looking for a 1 year lease.
name: Max Müller

content: Understood. Based on the information you provided, I would be willing to accept the rental price of 500 Euros per month for a 1 year lease. This is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in a prime location, and I believe it will attract quality tenants. However, I would like to clarify that this price does not include any additional fees or charges, such as utility bills or maintenance costs. These will be the responsibility of the tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month for a 1 year lease.

Thank you for considering my offer. I look forward to moving in.

Sincerely,
Max Müller
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for accepting my offer, Max. I am pleased to hear that you are looking forward to moving in. I wish you a pleasant experience in your new home. If you have any questions or concerns during your tenancy, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
